description: This file contains Polymer framework features, including template preparation, DOM manipulation, custom element registration, and shadow DOM handling, primarily for Polymer mini.html component.

classes.name: Polymer.DomApi
classes.description: Provides DOM manipulation and observation APIs, including node insertion, removal, cloning, and event handling, with support for Shadow DOM and Shady DOM.

classes.name: Polymer.EventApi
classes.description: Wraps DOM events to provide consistent access to event properties across Shadow DOM boundaries.

classes.name: Polymer.Base
classes.description: Core Polymer object with methods for feature registration, template handling, and DOM operations.

methods.name: _prepTemplate
methods.description: Prepares the template for the component, importing and decorating it.

methods.name: _stampTemplate
methods.description: Creates an instance of the template content.

methods.name: instanceTemplate
methods.description: Returns a cloned DOM node from the template.
